name: Illyria
attacked:
What? 


What? 

I'm gonna flay your men and use you to patch up our sails.
defeated: What was the point of all this? Were we the heroes?
introduction: I am Queen Tetua, and this is a robbery.
neutralHello: Pirates are heading to your current location right now.
tradeRequest: Normally I'd just pirate it but I'm feeling generous...
uniqueName:
Time to incessantly commit piracy and then disappear off the face of the Earth 

     -Duke u Egërsuar botën e krimit Born Shqipy Botim shqip©
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [Water] units>
uniqueText: Units are faster in coastal tiles, and coasts yield +1 [Gold]. Receive 1/3 of the cost of enemy water units, and Illyrian naval units pillage for free.
